nodes.text: The Imperial Research Facility located on the planet of Lok was used for weapon research in the later stages of the Galactic Civil War. Although General Otto was the ranking officer at the Lok Imperial Outpost, the facility and its associated mine had been kept a secret from him.

The Imperial Research Facility was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Imperial Research Facility was added to the game as part of the so-called "Nym's Theme Park", released with the "Publish 3" on October 8, 2003. This questline was later revamped with the release of the "Game Update 16: Stronghold of the Lok Revenants", on March 23, 2010.
